description: cmd/cgo: don't reimplement os/exec in util.go.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
I think there was a reason I did this. I don't remember what it was.

LGTM

Oh, this is cmd/cgo, not cmd/go. Then it's just that it predated os/exec.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=25ade06c3c16 ***

cmd/cgo: don't reimplement os/exec in util.go.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7450049

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
Submitting to kick off a new row on the dashboard.

subject: code review 7450049: cmd/cgo: don't reimplement os/exec in util.go.
